ConfigRemovableSlimeHutchIncubatorDescri: Allows you to remove the default slime incubator in the slime hutch
ConfigRandomizeMonsterPositions:
Randomize Monster Position
In Hutch Daily
ConfigRandomizeMonsterPositionsDescripti: Changes the position of all monsters in the hutch, so they are not clumped up in the top left corner
ConfigRandomizeOnlyModMonsterPositions:
Randomize Monster Position Does
Not Affect Slimes
ConfigIncubatorIsAffectedByCoopmasterDes: Whether Coopmaster should half the incubation duration (This is the case for base game slime incubator)
ConfigIncubatorDurationDescription: The incubator still only checks every morning for hatched monsters! This is either in days or minutes depending on the setting 'Incubation Duration Is In'.
ConfigIncubatorAdditionalRequiredItemIDD: An item ID that also gets consumed by the incubator in addition to the monster item (by default: life elixir)
ConfigIncubatorAdditionalRequiredItemCou: If you set this to less than 1, then the above item is no longer required
ConfigIncubatorRecipeDescription: The ingredients for the incubator recipe. It is on you that stardew valley can parse this as recipe ingredients!
ConfigIncubatorRecipeUnlockDescription: The unlock method for the incubator recipe. It is on you that stardew valley can parse this as a recipe unlock method!
ConfigBatFruitRatioDescription: The fruit to bat wing drop ratio for bats (default: 0.3)
ConfigSpiderBugMeatRatioDescription: The bug meat to void essence drop ratio for spiders (default: 0.7)
ConfigDustTripleShotRatioDescription: The triple shot espresso to coffee drop ratio for dust sprites (default: 0.3)
ConfigCinderChanceDescription: The daily chance a magma sprite will drop a cinder shard node (default: 0.5)
ConfigObsidianChanceDescription: The daily chance a magma sprite will drop obsidian (default: 0.08)
ConfigCrabOreChanceDescription: The daily chance an ore crab will drop an ore node (default: 0.5)
ConfigCrabTruffleChanceDescription: The daily chance a truffle crab will drop a truffle (default: 0.5)
ConfigStickGingerChanceDescription: The daily chance a stick bug will drop a ginger (default: 1)
ConfigOreBonusDescription: Number of extra drops from ore and cinder nodes in monster hutch (default: 4)
MonsterIncubator.name: Monster Incubator
MonsterIncubator.description: Grows a variety of monsters based on the input item. Does not work outside a hutch!
WizardLetter.content: @,^^   I know I can trust you with the blueprints for my latest invention, the 'Monster Incubator'. It reanimates monsters from their component parts. ^The transformation consumes 10 Void Essence and takes two days. As a safety measure, it only works in a 'Monster Hutch'.^^ Known reanimation subjects:^   *1 Mummified Bat > Living Bat^   *10 Coal > Dust Sprite^   *10 Bug Meat > Spider^   *10 Cinder Shard > Magma Sprite^   *10 Ore > Rock Crab^   *1 Truffle > Truffle Crab^   *1 Ginger > Stick Bug^^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard
MonsterIncubator.instructions:
-~-Monster Incubator Guide-~-

    The Monster Incubator reanimates monsters from one of their component parts. It consumes 10 Void Essence to power a transformation which will be complete after approximately two days. As a safety measure, it is designed to function only when placed within an appropriately secure location. Robin can construct a 'Monster Hutch' which can be used for breeding slimes as well as any monsters produced by the machine.

 Successful reanimation subjects:
 *1 Mummified Bat -> Living Bat
 *10 Coal -> Dust Sprite
 10 Bug Meat -> Spider
 *10 Cinder Shard -> Magma Sprite
 *10 Ore -> Rock Crab
 *1 Truffle -> Truffle Crab
 *1 Ginger -> Stick Bug
